title: Baby Carrier
description: orange, white, black; two panels sewn together; top square embroidered circles within orange diamonds; 2 3/4 border on 3 sides; bottom rectangle has same type of motif but divided into smaller squares and rectangles with brown borders; black edging around all; black lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
